title: PESSAT Counselling
content: I don't Understand one thing according to seat Matrix The Number of PESSAT SEATS are  288 but in the counselling they Give 360 Seats ?? What Scam is this ?? I guess this is to easily Convert it into Management Seats/ Higher Fee quota

comments.body: They were outdated figures, might else check it properly, because even two years back it was 360
I saw this Years Counselling photo
It is 360, cause seats have been increased, and the info u checked online was just old.
288 seats are there for KCET and PESSAT has 360 seats.

I think they take more students than seats in the first round of counseling coz they know many will leave their seats as other counseling happens. By the time session starts, I think less than 288 seats would be filled.
